snippet: Some fund managers bucked the trend of huge spring declines by concentrating on American utilities, currency trading and companies poised for disease-fighting breakthroughs.
abstract: Three mutual fund managers notably bucked the trend of huge second-quarter declines by concentrating on American utilities, currency trading and companies poised for disease-fighting breakthroughs; respectively, funds are Fidelity Select Utilities Portfolio, John Hancock Currency Strategies fund, and T Rowe Price Health Sciences fund.
lead_paragraph: Some fund managers bucked the trend of huge spring declines by concentrating on American utilities, currency trading and companies poised for disease-fighting breakthroughs.

headline.seo: Three Mutual Funds That Turned Back the Tide of Losses
headline.main: Three Funds That Turned Back the Tide of Losses
headline.print_headline: Three Funds That Turned Back the Tide of Losses
